attributes.action: Award all emergency service members veteran status upon retirement / resignation
attributes.background: All members of the emergency services risk their lives and leave their families to protect us and upon leaving receive no kind of recognition for their sacrifices unlike members of the armed forces who are awarded veteran status I believe all emergency service members should receive veteran status

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you mean by "veteran status".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
